trans-unit.source: Thrown when a module definition file references a script that cannot be located
trans-unit.target: Thrown when a module definition file references a script that cannot be located

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a custom module xml definition file references a script file in the <codeEntityReference>Language</codeEntityReference> element that does not exist in the zip package.
trans-unit.target: This exception is thrown when a custom module xml definition file references a script file in the <codeEntityReference>Language</codeEntityReference> element that does not exist in the zip package.

trans-unit.source: The script file path is defined in the <codeEntityReference>sourceFile</codeEntityReference> property of the <codeEntityReference>Language</codeEntityReference> element.
trans-unit.target: The script file path is defined in the <codeEntityReference>sourceFile</codeEntityReference> property of the <codeEntityReference>Language</codeEntityReference> element.

trans-unit.source: The path to the source file is relative to the root of the zip package (same location as the module xml definition files).
trans-unit.target: The path to the source file is relative to the root of the zip package (same location as the module xml definition files).

trans-unit.source: If the script file is in a sub folder, the relative path to the script file must be specified.
trans-unit.target: If the script file is in a sub folder, the relative path to the script file must be specified.

trans-unit.source: For instance, if all scripts were stored in a <userInputLocalizable>myScripts</userInputLocalizable> folder within the zip package, the <codeEntityReference>Language</codeEntityReference> element would have to add this path to the <codeEntityReference>sourceFile</codeEntityReference> property as below.
trans-unit.target: For instance, if all scripts were stored in a <userInputLocalizable>myScripts</userInputLocalizable> folder within the zip package, the <codeEntityReference>Language</codeEntityReference> element would have to add this path to the <codeEntityReference>sourceFile</codeEntityReference> property as below.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that the value of the <codeEntityReference>sourceFile</codeEntityReference> property in the <codeEntityReference>Language</codeEntityReference> element of the custom module xml definition is correct and that the source file exists in the correct relative path in the zip package.
trans-unit.target: Make sure that the value of the <codeEntityReference>sourceFile</codeEntityReference> property in the <codeEntityReference>Language</codeEntityReference> element of the custom module xml definition is correct and that the source file exists in the correct relative path in the zip package.

trans-unit.source: Referenced R script file does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Referenced R script file does not exist.

trans-unit.source: Referenced R script file '{0}' can not be found.
trans-unit.target: Referenced R script file '{0}' can not be found.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the relative path to the file is correct from the definitions location.
trans-unit.target: Ensure that the relative path to the file is correct from the definitions location.
